title: The flats constructed under the free sale component shall be first offered to the Central Govt
clause_text: The flats constructed under the free sale component shall be first offered to the Central Govt., its statutory bodies, Central/ State PSUs for purchase as staff quarters and if the Central Govt. or its statutory Bodies or Central/ State PSUs do not indicate willingness to purchase the same within the prescribed time limit, such flats shall be sold in open market.
section: 33(3) Buildings of Government/MCGM/Statutory Bodies, Semi- Government and PSU Offices:
